title: metadata
description: Descriptive information that can be a part of most objects.

appliesTo.description: Identifies that this object is associated with another object or class of objects.

comesFrom.description: Identifies that this object came from or was granted by another object or class of objects.

createdAt.description: Human time when this object was created, ISO format.

documentation.description: Human friendly documentation that can be stored with the (human unfriendly) JSON. For optimized systems, this attribute should be pruned at run time.
